## TensorFlow setup in R
```{r test-tensorflow}
library(reticulate)
use_virtualenv("~/tensorflow")
library(tensorflow)
sess = tf$Session()
hello <- tf$constant('Hello, TensorFlow!')
sess$run(hello)
```
